Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 27.08.2003
This UFB allows writing of changes for a record to DBHS with a single call
pi.TAB_PREFIX is used to check names of scanned variables fo inclusion
pi.LastVar is optional, if 0 program checks up to #pi.TAB_PREFIX
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.10.2011 JH SCR16841 Changed model 134 into 413 for DBHS_VALUE_OLD and DBHS_VALUE_NEW to support history writing in Unicode
27.10.2008 SH SCR14060 Added PI.UserId
13.11.2006 AK SCR12089 changed the tipy of pi.only gives back DBHS_KEY to 229
10.11.2006 AK SCR12089 added option to get back only DBHS_KEY without writing
to DBHS
06.11.2006 AK SCR12052 added output parameter PO.DBHS_KEY
16.06.2006 JJ SCR11408 DBHS_FIELD_NAME now using VarDbName() instead o VarName()
No error prepare variables
Build DBHS key for reference
if 'pi.only gives back DBHS_KEY' is true then stop here
we've added one separator too many so deduct 1 form used length
Default picture blank (as per varpic)
Date: YYYYDDMM
Time: HHMMSS
Numerics: strip thousand separator ( '.' ) and add path fill if neccesary
